I'm currently located in Vancouver, BC at the Institute for the Oceans and Fisheries (IOF) at UBC. I want to recognize that UBC is located on the traditional, ancestral, and unceded territory of the xʷməθkʷəy̓əm (Musqueam) people. [Learn more](https://indigenous.ubc.ca/indigenous-engagement/musqueam-and-ubc/).

To learn about the history and culture of the lands you live, work, and/or conduct research on, visit https://native-land.ca.
